author: cnbc.com
title: Papa John’s Announces Quarterly Dividend
text:
LOUISVILLE, Ky.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Papa John’s International, Inc. (NASDAQ: PZZA) today announced that the Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of $0.225 per common share, payable May 25, 2018, to shareholders of record at the close of business on May 14, 2018. At this quarterly dividend rate, the annual dividend is equivalent to $0.90 per common share.
Forward-Looking Statements
